remarks: Part 12 in [Baer] p. 49.  The map from vectors to functionals with closed kernels maps one-to-one onto.  Combined with ~ hdmapadd , this shows the map is an automorphism from the additive group of vectors to the additive group of functionals with closed kernels.  (Contributed by NM, 30-May-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hdmapf1o.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmapf1o.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapf1o.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmapf1o.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapf1o.d $e |- D = ( Base ` C ) $.
hdmapf1o.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapf1o.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmapf1oN $p |- ( ph -> S : V -1-1-onto-> D ) $.
